creator: SuperApp, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
SuperApp is a ridesharing app for fast, reliable rides in minutes—day or night. Don't Worry about Congested roads? Inconvenient public vehicles? Overpriced taxi services? Just SuperApp & Go! There’s no need to park or wait for a taxi or bus. With SuperApp, you just tap to request a ride, and it’s easy to pay with cash in hand in Kathmandu, Nepal.

Whether you’re going to the airport or across town, there’s an SuperApp for every occasion. SuperApp is available in Kathmandu, Bhaktapur & Lalitpur cities in Nepal—download the app and take your ride today.

Requesting your SuperApp is easy—here’s how it works:
- Just open the SuperApp Choose your vehicle type.
- Set your Pickup Location & Set Where do you want to go.
- Then tap on Get a Ride & When SuperPartner Accept your Ride.
- The app uses your location so your rider knows where to pick you up.
- You’ll see your rider's picture, vehicle details, and can track their arrival on the map.
- Payment can be made by cash in hand Kathmandu, Nepal.
- After the ride, you can rate your rider and provide feedback to help us improve the SuperApp experience.

Need a simple way to get from A to B quickly? Take SuperApp, our most affordable individual option.

Be SuperUser, Be SuperCustomer & Be SuperHero

SuperApp is a ridesharing app for fast, reliable rides in minutes—day or night. Don't Worry about Congested roads? Inconvenient public vehicles? Overpriced taxi services? Just SuperApp & Go! There’s no need to park or wait for a taxi or bus. With SuperApp, you just tap to request a ride, and it’s easy to pay with cash in hand in Kathmandu, Nepal.

Whether you’re going to the airport or across town, there’s an SuperApp for every occasion. SuperApp is available in Kathmandu, Bhaktapur & Lalitpur cities in Nepal—download the app and take your ride today.

Requesting your SuperApp is easy—here’s how it works:
- Just open the SuperApp Choose your vehicle type.
- Set your Pickup Location & Set Where do you want to go.
- Then tap on Get a Ride & When SuperPartner Accept your Ride.
- The app uses your location so your rider knows where to pick you up.
- You’ll see your rider's picture, vehicle details, and can track their arrival on the map.
- Payment can be made by cash in hand Kathmandu, Nepal.
- After the ride, you can rate your rider and provide feedback to help us improve the SuperApp experience.

Need a simple way to get from A to B quickly? Take SuperApp, our most affordable individual option.

Be SuperUser, Be SuperCustomer & Be SuperHero

Sahara is a ridesharing app for fast, reliable rides in minutes—day or night. Don't Worry about Congested roads? Inconvenient public vehicles? Overpriced taxi services? Just Sahara& Go! There’s no need to park or wait for a taxi or bus. With Sahara, you just tap to request a ride, and it’s easy to pay with cash in hand in Kathmandu, Nepal.

Whether you’re going to the airport or across town, there’s an Sahara for every occasion. SuperApp is available in Kathmandu, Bhaktapur & Lalitpur cities in Nepal—download the app and take your ride today.

Requesting your Sahara is easy—here’s how it works:
- Just open the Sahara Choose your vehicle type.
- Set your Pickup Location & Set Where do you want to go.
- Then tap on Get a Ride & When SaharaPartner Accept your Ride.
- The app uses your location so your rider knows where to pick you up.
- You’ll see your rider's picture, vehicle details, and can track their arrival on the map.
- Payment can be made by cash in hand Kathmandu, Nepal.
- After the ride, you can rate your rider and provide feedback to help us improve the Sahara experience.

Need a simple way to get from A to B quickly? Take Sahara , our most affordable individual option.

Be SaharaUser, Be Sahara Customer & Be SaharaHero
